overview: Since exploding onto the music scene in 1983, Madonna has become a pop icon and is among the top-selling artists of all time. This unauthorized documentary explores her life and career, featuring interviews with music industry notables and rarely seen press from Madonna's early years. Whether you're a fan of her music, her films or her chameleonlike persona, this portrait will introduce you to a side of Madonna's life you've never seen before.
title: Madonna: Wild Angel
